headline: AP Pension selects Cognizant for BPO and RPA-services as part of multi-year transformation
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) today announced a new partnership with AP Pension, one of Denmark's leading life and pension companies. The collaboration encompasses Business Process Outsourcing (BPO), Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and optimization of selected administrative processes, aimed at enhancing AP Pension's capacity to undertake a comprehensive transformation in the coming years.

content.title: AP Pension selects Cognizant for BPO and RPA-services as part of multi-year transformation

headline: Assessing Cognizant’s True Value After 13% Decline and Industry Peer Outperformance
summary: If you’ve been following Cognizant Technology Solutions lately, you might be wondering where the stock is really headed from here. After all, the price hasn’t made any major leaps in recent months. The stock is up just 0.4% in the last week, but down 5.6% over the past month. In fact, shares have dropped 13.5% so far this year and are off 14.0% over the past twelve months. Yet, if you zoom out, the stock still holds a 15.2% gain from three years ago, even though it’s down 3.8% from five years...
